TOTAL AED AED

TERMS and CONDETIONS:

1- Purchase order to be addressed to: EVAD DWC-LLC.
2- Purchase order to be sent to the following: Orders@EVAD-ME.COM.
3- This quotation supersedes all previous quotations and is valid for 1 Month from date of issue, unless otherwise stated.
4- This quotation, and any purchase orders issued pursuant to this quotation, are subject to EVAD Terms and Conditions.
5- The amount mentioned hereinabove shall be received in full, without any deduction or changing, and any transfer fees shall be the responsibility of the buyer.
6- This quote and the price hereinabove is excluding any taxes, and any incurred taxes shall be the responsibility of the buyer and shall not be charged back to EVAD DWC-LLC in any time now or in future.
7- Please reference the following statement on your purchase order: “This order is issued pursuant to QEVAD202 {{doc.name}} dated {{doc.get_formatted("due_date") or ''}} , without change or alteration and such Quote is incorporated herein and an integral part hereof”.
8- The prices hereinabove is valid for the whole solution, and can't be divided or reduced, otherwise the prices will need to be revised.
9- Custom clearance is the responsibility of the buyer and/or the end user, and EVAD DWC-LLC shall not be liable for any custom clearance charges.
10- The license and any PS activities or project coordination may be suspended within 7 days from the related payment due date in case of any delay.
11- In the event of difference in pricing due to exchange rates, AED pricing will be the reference point.
12- in case the order is containing y hardware equipment, the estimated HW delivery is 8 - 10 weeks from the date of receiving the PO.

PAYMENT TERMS:

- 100% Advance, Invoice will be issued upon receiving the PO.
